item.title: Portland, OR - Air Quality Forecast
item.description:
<!-- Format data output -->
					<div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
					<table style="width: 350px;">
						<tr>
							<td>
								<br>

							<td valign="top">
								<div><b>Location:</b>  Portland, OR</div><br />

									<b>Forecast:</b><br />
									Today, 08/05/2017: Good  - 50 AQI - Particle Pollution (2.5 microns)<br />
									<br />
									
										<div>
											Tomorrow, 08/06/2017: Good  - 50 AQI - Particle Pollution (2.5 microns)<br />

										<br />
									
								</div>
